index_name.title: Index Name
index_name.description: Specify a name of the index, which will be downloaded from OpenSearch instance.

request_body.title: Query
request_body.description:
Query (in JSON), which will be sent together with a request. Allows to specify returned columns and other useful parameters. See OpenSearch Query DSL documentation for all possible attributes.
You can also specify scroll parameter to manage scroll length.

time_window_minutes.title: Time Window (Minutes)
time_window_minutes.description: Specifies the default time window in minutes for generated range query if custom query is not provided.

storage_table.title: Output Table Name
storage_table.description: Name of the output table in storage.

primary_keys.title: Primary Keys
primary_keys.description: Specify primary keys for the storage table.

incremental.title: Load Type
incremental.description: Whether to load data into storage incrementally, or utilizing the full load.
